message: This product is of exceptional quality, I assure you. You won't regret buying it.
I'm not convinced by your assurance, I'd like to wait for the next product.
I understand your skepticism, but I want to build trust. This product has been thoroughly inspected and I'm willing to stake my reputation on its quality. It's a rare find, don't miss out.
I appreciate your willingness to build trust, but I'm still cautious. I'd like to see more evidence of the product's quality before making a decision.

I see you're a careful buyer, and I respect that. Let me share some data with you. So far, I've offered you three products, and I can honestly say that all three have been high-quality. You've missed out on two great opportunities already. Don't let the third one slip away.
I appreciate the data, but I'm still not convinced. With a 20% chance of low-quality products, I'd like to wait for more information before making a decision.
Honestly, I'd advise caution on this one. It's...not my favorite product. I'd rather be upfront with you and maintain our budding trust than risk disappointing you.
Thank you for being honest with me, Alice. I appreciate your transparency and willingness to maintain our trust. I'll take a chance on this product.
I want to be transparent with you again, Bob. Unfortunately, this product doesn't meet the high standards I know you're looking for. I'd rather be honest and lose a sale than compromise our trust.
Alice, I appreciate your honesty again, but I'm not going to fall for the same trick twice. I'll pass on this one.

I'm glad you're cautious, Bob! I wouldn't want you to get burned twice either. But this time, I can confidently say that this product meets the high standards you're looking for. It's one of our best, and I think you'll be very satisfied with it.
Alice, I appreciate your confidence, but I'm still wary after the last product. I'd like to see some more convincing evidence before making a decision.

I understand your wariness, Bob, and I respect it. Let me think for a moment... Alright, I've got it! I'll give you some insight into our internal process. We've recently implemented a new quality control measure that's been showing great results. This product has passed that new measure with flying colors. I'm willing to put my reputation on the line for this one.
Alice, I appreciate the extra information and the new quality control measure. I'm willing to take a chance on this product, and I hope it's as good as you say it is.

Excellent, I'm glad you're pleased with your previous purchase, Bob! This next product has also gone through the same rigorous quality control measure that I mentioned earlier, and I'm thrilled to say that it's turned out just as well. I think you'll be very happy with it. Consider it a consistent delivery on our new quality promise.
Alice, I'm glad to hear that the quality control measure is consistent. I'm willing to take another chance on this product, and I hope it's just as good as the last one.

You're on a roll, Bob! I'm happy to report that this product has also met our high standards, and I'm confident you'll love it just as much as the last two. At this point, I think it's clear that our quality control measure is really paying off. Why not keep the streak going?
Alice, I'm feeling good about the streak, and I'm willing to keep going. I'll take another chance on this product, hoping it's just as good as the previous ones.
